testcase.name: Broken ID locator
testcase.classname: RTCtek - Demonstrate failing locators across strategies
testcase.system-out: @rtctek @bad_id Scenario: Broken ID locator # src/test/resources/features/rtctek_locators.feature:12 ✅ RTC configuration loaded successfully 🔧 Creating WebDriver - Browser: chrome, Grid: true, Headless: false ✅ RTC Smart Driver HTTP integration initialized 🔧 RTC WebDriver wrapper initialized with automatic healing Given I open the RTCtek homepage # com.example.steps.LocatorSteps.i_open_the_rtctek_homepage() Given I open the RTCtek homepage # com.example.steps.LocatorSteps.i_open_the_rtctek_homepage() 🔧 Locator failed, attempting RTC healing: By.id: menu-main-men When I try to locate by "id" with value "menu-main-men" # com.example.steps.LocatorSteps.i_try_to_locate_by_with_value(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) ✅ Test completed - Locator failed as expected (no healing) Then the step should fail due to locator issue # com.example.steps.LocatorSteps.the_step_should_fail_due_to_locator_issue() 🔧 Browser closed after test scenario
